arabicText: بَلَىٰ مَن كَسَبَ سَيِّئَةًۭ وَأَحَـٰطَتْ بِهِۦ خَطِيٓـَٔتُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Yes,	 why	 not?	 *	 The	 one	 who	 earns	 evil	
and	his	sin	surrounds	him;	he	is	from	the	
people	of	fire	(hell);	they	will	remain	in	it	
forever. (You	 will	 remain	 in	 the	 fire	
forever).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hān	 kiyuñ	 nhi	 jo	 gunah	 kamāye	 aur	 uski	 khata	 usey	 gher	 le	 woh	 dozakh	 wālon	 meiñ	 haiñ	
unheiñ	hamesha	us	meiñ	rahna

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	believe	and	do	good	deeds	- they	are	the	People	of	Paradise;	they	will	abide	in	it	
forever.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	jo	Īmān	lāye	aur	achche	kām	kiye	woh	Jannat	wāle	haiñ	unheiñ	hamesha	us	meiñ	rahna

arabicText: وَإِذْ أَخَذْنَا مِيثَـٰقَ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ لَا تَعْبُدُونَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ وَبِٱلْوَٰلِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًۭا وَذِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ وَٱلْيَتَـٰمَىٰ وَٱلْمَسَـٰكِينِ وَقُولُوا۟ لِلنَّاسِ حُسْنًۭا وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ ثُمَّ تَوَلَّيْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا مِّنكُمْ وَأَنتُم مُّعْرِضُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	(remember)	when	We	took	a	covenant	from	the	Descendants	of	Israel	that,	“Do	not	worship	
anyone	except	Allah;	and	be	good	to	parents,	relatives,	orphans	and	the	needy,	and	speak	kindly	
to	people	and	keep	the	prayer	established	and	pay	the	charity”;	thereafter	you	retracted,	except	
some	of	you;	and	you	are	those	who	turn	away
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	ham	ne	bani	Isra’il	se	‘ahed	liya	ke	Allah	ke	siwa	kisi	ko	na	poojo	aur	mā	bāp	ke	sath	
bhalāi	karo	aur	rishtey	dāroñ aur	yateemoñ aur	miskeenoñ	se	aur	logoñ	se	achchi	bāt	kaho	aur	
Namāz	 qāyem	 rakho	aur	Zakāt	 do	 phir	 tum	 phir	gaye	magar	 tum	meiñ	 ke	 thode	aur	 tum	 rugardān	ho

arabicText: وَإِذْ أَخَذْنَا مِيثَـٰقَكُمْ لَا تَسْفِكُونَ دِمَآءَكُمْ وَلَا تُخْرِجُونَ أَنفُسَكُم مِّن دِيَـٰرِكُمْ ثُمَّ أَقْرَرْتُمْ وَأَنتُمْ تَشْهَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 We	 took	 a	 covenant	 from	 you	
that,	 “Do	 not	 shed	 the	 blood	 of	 your	 own	
people	nor	 turn	out	your	own	people	 from	
your	 colonies”;	 you	 then	 acknowledged	 it	
and	you	are	witnesses.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	ham	ne	tum	se	‘ahed	liya	ke	apnoñ	
ka	 khoon	 na	 karna	 aur	 apnoñ	 ko	 apni	
bastiyoñ	 se	 na	 nikalna	 phir	 tum	 ne	 iska	
iqrār	kiya	aur	tum	gawāh	ho

arabicText: ثُمَّ أَنتُمْ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ تَقْتُلُونَ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَتُخْرِجُونَ فَرِيقًۭا مِّنكُم مِّن دِيَـٰرِهِمْ تَظَـٰهَرُونَ عَلَيْهِم بِٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْعُدْوَٰنِ وَإِن يَأْتُوكُمْ أُسَـٰرَىٰ تُفَـٰدُوهُمْ وَهُوَ مُحَرَّمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ إِخْرَاجُهُمْ ۚ أَفَتُؤْمِنُونَ بِبَعْضِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَتَكْفُرُونَ بِبَعْضٍۢ ۚ فَمَا جَزَآءُ مَن يَفْعَلُ ذَٰلِكَ مِنكُمْ إِلَّا خِزْىٌۭ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ يُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰٓ أَشَدِّ ٱلْعَذَابِ ۗ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ بِغَـٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Then	it	is	you	who	began	slaying	each	other	
and	 you	 drive	 out	 a	 group	 of your	 people	
from	 their	 homeland	 - providing	 support	
against	 them	 (to	 their	 opponents)	 through	
sin	and	injustice;	and	if	they	come	to	you	as	
captives	 you	 redeem	 them,	 whereas	 their	
expulsion	 itself	 is	 forbidden	 to	 you;	 so	 do	
you	 believe	 in	 some	 of	 Allah’s	 commands	
and	 disbelieve	 in	 some?	 So	 what	 is	 the	
reward	of	those	who	do	so,	except	disgrace	
in	 this	 world?	 And	 on	 the	 Day	 of	
Resurrection	 they	 will	 be	 assigned	 to	 the	
most	grievous	punishment;	and	Allah is	not	
unaware	of	your	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	yeh	jo	tum	ho	apno	ko	qatl	karne	lage	
aur	 apne	 meiñ	 ek	 giroh	 unke	 watan	 se	
nikālte	 ho un	 par	 madad	 dete	 ho	 (unke	
mukhalif	 ko)	 gunāh	 aur	 ziyadati	 meiñ	 aur	
agar	wo	Qaidi	hokar	 tumhāre	pās	āayeñ	 to	
badla	 dekar	 churda	 lete	 ho	 aur	 unka	
nikālna	tum	par	harām	hai	to	kiya	khuda	ke	
kuchh	hukmoñ	par	 Īmān	lāte	ho	aur	kuchh	
se	inkār	 karte	 ho	 to	jo	 tum	meiñ	aisa	 kare	
uska	 badla	 kiya	 hai	 magar	 	 yeh	 ke	 duniya	
meiñ	ruswa	ho	aur	Qayamat	meiñ	sakht	tar	
‘azāb	 ki	 taraf	 phere	 jāyeñge	 aur	 Allah	
tumhāre	kotakoñ	se	bekhabar	nahiñ

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشْتَرَوُا۟ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۖ فَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
These	 are	 the	 people	 who	 bought	 the	
worldly	 life	 in	 exchange	 of	 the	 Hereafter	-
so	 their	 punishment	 will	 not	 be	 lightened,	
nor	will	they	be	helped.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	 haiñ	 wo	 log	 jinhone	 Ākhirat	 ke	 badle	
duniya	 ki	 zindagi	 mol	 li	 to	 na	 un	 par	 se	
‘azāb	halka	aur	na	unki	madad	ki	jāye

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَقَفَّيْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ بِٱلرُّسُلِ ۖ وَءَاتَيْنَا عِيسَى ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَأَيَّدْنَـٰهُ بِرُوحِ ٱلْقُدُسِ ۗ أَفَكُلَّمَا جَآءَكُمْ رَسُولٌۢ بِمَا لَا تَهْوَىٰٓ أَنفُسُكُمُ ٱسْتَكْبَرْتُمْ فَفَرِيقًۭا كَذَّبْتُمْ وَفَرِيقًۭا تَقْتُلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 indeed	 We	 gave	 Moosa	 (Moses)	 the	
Book	 and	 subsequent	 to	 him,	 sent	 Noble	
Messengers	 one	 after	 another	 - and	 We	
gave	Eisa	(Jesus),	the	son	of	Maryam	(Mary),	
clear	 proofs	 and	 supported	 him	 with	 the	
Holy	 Spirit;	 so	 when	 a	 Noble	 Messenger	
from	Allah comes	to	you	bringing	what	you	
yourselves	do	not	desire,	you	grow	arrogant;	so	you	disbelieve	in	a	group	of	the	Prophets	and	
another	group	of	Prophets	you	slay!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	beshak	ham	ne	Mūsā ko	Kitāb	ata	ki	aur	
uske	 b‘ād	 pe	 dar	 pe	 Rasool	 bheje	 aur	 ham	
ne	‘Isā	bin	Maryam ko	khuli	nishāniyāñ	ata	
farmāyiñ	aur	pāk	rooh	se	uski	madad	ki	 to	
kya	tumhāre	pās	koi	Rasool	woh	lekar	āaye	jo	tumhāre	nafs	ki	khuwahish	nahi	takabbur	karte	
ho	to	un	meiñ	ek	giroh	ko	tum	jhutlāte	aur	ek	giroh	ko	shaheed	karte	ho	?

arabicText: وَقَالُوا۟ قُلُوبُنَا غُلْفٌۢ ۚ بَل لَّعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِكُفْرِهِمْ فَقَلِيلًۭا مَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	 Jews	 said,	 “Our	 hearts	 are	 covered”;	 in	 fact	 Allah has	 cursed	 them	 because	 of	 their	
disbelief,	so	only	a	few	of	them	accept	faith.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Yahūdi	bole	hamāre	dilon	par	parde	pade	haiñ	balke	Allah	ne	un	par	la'nat	ki	unke	kufr	ke	
sabab	to	unmeiñ	thode	Īmān	lāte	haiñ

arabicText: وَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ كِتَـٰبٌۭ مِّنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ مُصَدِّقٌۭ لِّمَا مَعَهُمْ وَكَانُوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ يَسْتَفْتِحُونَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم مَّا عَرَفُوا۟ كَفَرُوا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ فَلَعْنَةُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 the	 Book	 from	 Allah (the	 Holy	
Qu’ran)	 came	 to	 them,	 which	 confirms	 the	
Book	 in	 their	 possession	 (the	 Taurat	 /	
Torah)	- and	 before	 that	 they	 used	 to	 seek	
victory	 through	 the	 medium	 of	 this	 very	
Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	
be	upon	him)	over	the	disbelievers;	so	when	
the	 one	 whom	 they	 fully	 recognised	 (the	
Holy	 Prophet)	 came	 to	 them,	 they	 turned	
disbelievers	 - therefore	 Allah’s	 curse	 is	
upon	the	disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jab	 unke	 pās	 Allah	 ki	 woh	 Kitāb	
(Qur’ān)	 āayi	 jo	 unke	 sāth	 wāli	 Kitāb	
(Tauret)	 ki	 tasdeeq	 farmāti	 hai	 aur	 is	 se	
pahle	 usi	 Nabi	 ke	 waseele	 se	 kāfiroñ	 par	
fateh	māngte	they	to	jab	tashreef	lāya	unke	
pās	 woh	 jāna	 pehchāna	 to	 usse	munkir	 ho	
baithe	to	Allah ki	la'nat	munkiron	par

arabicText: بِئْسَمَا ٱشْتَرَوْا۟ بِهِۦٓ أَنفُسَهُمْ أَن يَكْفُرُوا۟ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ بَغْيًا أَن يُنَزِّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ ۖ فَبَآءُو بِغَضَبٍ عَلَىٰ غَضَبٍۢ ۚ وَلِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَذَابٌۭ مُّهِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
How	 abject	 is	 the	 price	 for	 which	 they	
exchange	 their	 lives	 that	 they	 should	
disbelieve	 in	 what	 Allah has sent	 down,	
jealous	that	Allah should	reveal	of	His	grace	
to	 whomever	He	 wills	 of	His	 bondmen!	 So
they	 deserved	 wrath	 upon	 wrath;	 and	 for	
the	 disbelievers	 is	 a	 disgraceful	
punishment..
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kis	 bure	 moloñ	 unhoñ	 ne	 apni	 jānoñ	 ko	
kharida	 ke	 Allah	 ke	 utāre	 se	 munkir	 hoñ	
iski	 jalan	 se	 ke	 Allah	 apne	 fazl	 se	 apne	 jis	
bande	par	chāhe	wahee	utāre	to	ghazab	par	
ghazab	 ke	 saza-wār	 huwe	 aur	 kāfiroñ	 ke	
liye	zillat	ka	‘azāb	hai

arabicText: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ ءَامِنُوا۟ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ قَالُوا۟ نُؤْمِنُ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْنَا وَيَكْفُرُونَ بِمَا وَرَآءَهُۥ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ مُصَدِّقًۭا لِّمَا مَعَهُمْ ۗ قُلْ فَلِمَ تَقْتُلُونَ أَنۢبِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ مِن قَبْلُ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 it	 is	 said	 to	 them,	 “Believe	 in	
what	 Allah has	 sent	 down",	 they	 say,	 “We	
believe	 in	 what	 was	 sent	 down	 to	 us,	 and	
disbelieve	 in	 the	 rest”	 - whereas	 it	 is	 the	
Truth	 confirming	 what	 they	 possess!	 Say	
(to	them,	O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad - peace	
and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	 “Why	 did	 you	
then	 martyr	 the	 earlier	 Prophets,	 if	 you	
believed	in	your	Book?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jab	 unse	 kaha	 jāye	 ke	 utāre	 par	 Imān	
lao	to	kahte	haiñ	wo	jo	ham	par	utra	us	par	
Imān	 lāte	 haiñ	 aur	 baqi	 se	 munkir	 hote	
haiñ,	 halāñke	 woh	 haq	 hai	 unke	 pās	 wāle	 ki	 tasdeeq	 farmāta	 huwa	 tum	 farmao	 ke	 phir	 agle
Ambiya	ko	kiyuñ	shaheed	kiya	agar	tumheiñ	apni	kitāb	par	Imān	tha

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَكُم مُّوسَىٰ بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذْتُمُ ٱلْعِجْلَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ وَأَنتُمْ ظَـٰلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	Moosa	came	to	you	with	clear	signs,	and	after	it	you	worshipped	the	calf	- and	you	
were	unjust.	”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 beshak	 tumhāre	 pās	 Mūsā khuli	 nishāniyāñ	 lekar	 tashreef	 lāya	 phir	 tum	 ne	 uske	 b'ād	
bachrde	ko	ma'bood	bana	liya	aur	tum	zalim	they

arabicText: وَإِذْ أَخَذْنَا مِيثَـٰقَكُمْ وَرَفَعْنَا فَوْقَكُمُ ٱلطُّورَ خُذُوا۟ مَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكُم بِقُوَّةٍۢ وَٱسْمَعُوا۟ ۖ قَالُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا وَعَصَيْنَا وَأُشْرِبُوا۟ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلْعِجْلَ بِكُفْرِهِمْ ۚ قُلْ بِئْسَمَا يَأْمُرُكُم بِهِۦٓ إِيمَـٰنُكُمْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 remember	when	We	made	a	 covenant	with	 you	and	 raised	 the	Mount	 Tur	(Sinai)	above	
you;	 “Accept	 and	 hold	 fast	 to	 what	 We	 give	 you,	 and	 listen”;	 they	 said,	 “We	 hear	 and	 we	
disobey”;	and	the	calf	was	still	embedded	in	their	hearts	because	of	their	disbelief;	say	(O	dear	
Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	 “What	an	evil	command	is	what	your	
faith	orders	you,	if	you	are	believers!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yād	karo	jab	ham	ne	tum	se	paiman	liya	aur	Koh-e-Toor		ko	tumhāre saroñ	par	bulañd	kiya	
lo	jo	ham	tumheiñ	dete	haiñ zor	se	aur	suno	bole	ham	ne	suna	aur	na	māna	aur	unke	diloñ	meiñ	
bachrda	 rach	 raha	 tha	 unke	 kufr	 ke	 sabab, tum	 farmado	 kiya	 bura	 hukm	 deta	 hai	 tumko	
tumhāra	Imān	agar	Imān	rakhte	ho

arabicText: قُلْ إِن كَانَتْ لَكُمُ ٱلدَّارُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَالِصَةًۭ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُا۟ ٱلْمَوْتَ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	
blessings	be	upon	him),	 “If	 the	abode	of	 the	
Hereafter	 in	 the	 sight	 of	 Allah is	 for	 you	
alone	 and	 none else,	 then	long	 for	 death	if	
you	are	truthful!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmao	 agar	 pichla	 ghar	 Allah	 ke	
nazdeek	khālis	tumhāre	liye	ho	na	auroñ	ke	
liye	 to	 bhala	 maut	 ki	 āarzoo	 to	 karo	 agar	
sachhe	ho

arabicText: وَلَن يَتَمَنَّوْهُ أَبَدًۢا بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hargiz	kabhi	uski	āarzu	na	kareñge	un	
bad	 a'amaliyoñ	 ke	 sabab	 jo	 āge	 kar	 chuke	
aur	Allah	khoob	jānta	hai	zālimon	ko

arabicText: وَلَتَجِدَنَّهُمْ أَحْرَصَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَلَىٰ حَيَوٰةٍۢ وَمِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَشْرَكُوا۟ ۚ يَوَدُّ أَحَدُهُمْ لَوْ يُعَمَّرُ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍۢ وَمَا هُوَ بِمُزَحْزِحِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ أَن يُعَمَّرَ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرٌۢ بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. And	you	will	surely	find	them	the	greediest	
among	 mankind	 for	 life;	 and	 (likewise)	
among	the	polytheists	(idolaters);	each	one	
of	 them	 yearns	 to	 live	 a	 thousand	 years;	
and	 the	grant	of	such	age	will	not	distance	
him	 from	 the	 punishment;	 and	 Allah is	
seeing their	misdeeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	beshak	tum	zaroor	unheñ	pāo	ge	ke	sab	
logoñ	se	ziyada	jeene	ki	hawas	rakhte	haiñ	
aur	 mushrikoñ	 se	 ek	 ko	 tamanna	 hai	 ke	
kaheeñ	hazār	baras	jiye	aur	woh	usey	‘azāb	
se	 door	 na	 Karega	 itni	 umar	 diya	 jāna	 aur	
Allah	 unke	 Kautak (Bure	 Amal) dekh	 raha	
hai

arabicText: قُلْ مَن كَانَ عَدُوًّۭا لِّجِبْرِيلَ فَإِنَّهُۥ نَزَّلَهُۥ عَلَىٰ قَلْبِكَ بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ مُصَدِّقًۭا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ وَهُدًۭى وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
. Say	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	
blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	 “Whoever	 is	 an	
enemy	to	Jibreel	(Gabriel)”	- for	it	is	he	who	
has	brought	down	this	Qu’ran	to	your	heart	
by	Allah’s	 command,	 confirming	 the	Books	
before	it,	and	a	guidance	and	glad	tidings	to	
Muslims.	-
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmado	jo	koi	 Jibreel	ka	dushman	ho	
to	 us	 (Jibreel)	 ne	 to	 tumhāre	 dil	 par	 Allah	
ke	hukm	se	yeh	Qur'ān	utāra	agli	kitāboñ	ki	
tasdeeq	 farmāta	 aur	 hidāyat-o-basharat	
Musalmanoñ	ko

arabicText: مَن كَانَ عَدُوًّۭا لِّلَّهِ وَمَلَـٰٓئِكَتِهِۦ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَجِبْرِيلَ وَمِيكَىٰلَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَدُوٌّۭ لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“Whoever	 is	 an	 enemy	 to	 Allah,	 and	 His	
angels	 and	 His	 Noble	 Messengers,	 and	
Jibreel	and	Mikaeel	(Michael)	-,	then	(know	
that),	Allah is	an	enemy	of	the	disbelievers.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Jo	koi	dushman	ho	Allah	aur	uske	Firishtoñ	
ka	uske	Rasooloñ	aur	Jibreel	aur	Mikaēel	ka	
to	Allah	dushman	hai	kafiroñ	ka

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ءَايَـٰتٍۭ بَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ ۖ وَمَا يَكْفُرُ بِهَآ إِلَّا ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. We	 have	 indeed	 sent	 down	 to	 you	 clear	 signs;	 and	 none	 will	 disbelieve	 in	 them	 except	 the	
sinners.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	beshak	hum	ne	 tumhāri	 taraf	raushan	Āyateiñ	utāreeñ	aur	unke	munkir	na	hoñge	magar	
fāsiq	log

arabicText: أَوَكُلَّمَا عَـٰهَدُوا۟ عَهْدًۭا نَّبَذَهُۥ فَرِيقٌۭ مِّنْهُم ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	is	it	that	whenever	they	make	a	covenant,	only	a	group	of	them	throws	it	aside?	In	fact,	
most	of	them	do	not have	faith.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kiya	jab	kabhi	koi	‘ahed	karte	haiñ	un	meiñ	ka	ek	fareeq	usey	pheñk	deta	hai	balki	un	meiñ	
bahuteroñ	ko	Imān	nahi

arabicText: وَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌۭ مِّنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ مُصَدِّقٌۭ لِّمَا مَعَهُمْ نَبَذَ فَرِيقٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ كِتَـٰبَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَآءَ ظُهُورِهِمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 a	 Noble	 Messenger	 from	 Allah came	 to	 them,	 confirming	 the	 Book(s)	 which	 they	
possessed,	a	group	of	those	who	have	received	the	Book(s)	flung	the	Book	of	Allah behind	their	
backs	as	if	they	were	totally	unaware
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	jab	unke	pās	tashreef	lāya	Allah	ke	yahāñ	se	ek	Rasool	unki	kitāboñ	ki	tasdeeq	farmāta	to	
kitāb	wāloñ	se	ek	giroh	ne	Allah	ki	kitāb	apne	peeth	peechhe	phenk	di	goya	woh	kuch	ilm	hi	
nahiñ	rakhte

arabicText: وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَا تَتْلُوا۟ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ عَلَىٰ مُلْكِ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۖ وَمَا كَفَرَ سُلَيْمَـٰنُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُعَلِّمُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ ٱلسِّحْرَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَى ٱلْمَلَكَيْنِ بِبَابِلَ هَـٰرُوتَ وَمَـٰرُوتَ ۚ وَمَا يُعَلِّمَانِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَآ إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ فِتْنَةٌۭ فَلَا تَكْفُرْ ۖ فَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مِنْهُمَا مَا يُفَرِّقُونَ بِهِۦ بَيْنَ ٱلْمَرْءِ وَزَوْجِهِۦ ۚ وَمَا هُم بِضَآرِّينَ بِهِۦ مِنْ أَحَدٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مَا يَضُرُّهُمْ وَلَا يَنفَعُهُمْ ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمُوا۟ لَمَنِ ٱشْتَرَىٰهُ مَا لَهُۥ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ مِنْ خَلَـٰقٍۢ ۚ وَلَبِئْسَ مَا شَرَوْا۟ بِهِۦٓ أَنفُسَهُمْ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	followed	what	the	devils	used	to	
read	during	the	rule	of	Sulaiman	(Solomon	
- peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him);	 and	
Sulaiman did	not	disbelieve,	but	the	devils	
disbelieved	- they	teach	people	magic;	and	
that	 which	 was	 sent	 down	 to	 the	 two	
angels,	 Harut	 and	 Marut	 in	 Babylon;	 and	
the	 two	(angels)	 never	 taught	 a	 thing	 to	
anyone	 until	 they	 used	 to	 say,	 “We	 are	
only	 a	 trial,	 therefore	 do	 not	 lose	 your	
faith”	 and	 they	 used	 to	 learn	 from	 them	
that	 by	 which	 they	 cause	 division	
between	 man	 and	 his	 wife;	 and	 they	
cannot	 harm	 anyone	 by	 it	 except	 by	
Allah’s	 command;	 and	 they	 learn	 what	
will	 harm	 them,	 not	 benefit	 them;	 and	
surely	 they	 know	that	 whoever	 bargains	
for	 this	 will	 not	 have	 a	 share	 in	 the	
Hereafter;	 and	 for	 what	 an	 abject	 thing	
they	 have	 sold	 themselves;	 if	 only	 they	
knew!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 uske	 pairo	 huwe	 jo	 shaitān	 padha	
karte	they	Saltanat-e-SulaImān ke	zamāne	
meiñ	 aur	 Sulaimān ne	 kufr	 na	 kiya	 hāñ	
shaitān	 kāfir	 huwe	logoñ	 ko	jādu	 sikhāte	
haiñ	 aur	 woh	 (jādu)	 jo	 Bābil	 meiñ	 do	
Firishtoñ	Hāroot	wa Māroot	 par	 utra	aur	
woh	donoñ	kisi	ko	kuch na	sikhāte	jab	tak	
yeh	 na	 kah	 lete	 ke	 ham	 to	 niri	 āzmāish	
haiñ	tu	apnā	Imān	na	kho	to unse	seekhte	
woh	 jis	 se	 judāi	 dāleiñ	 mard	 aur	 uski	
aurat	meiñ	aur	usse	zarar	nahi	pahoñcha	
sakte	kisi	ko	magar	Khuda	ke	hukm	se	aur	
woh	 seekhte	 haiñ	jo	 unheiñ	 nuqsān	 dega	
nafa'	 na	 dega	 aur	 beshak	 zaroor	 unheiñ	
ma'loom	 hai	 ke	 jis	 ne	 yeh	 sauda	 liya	
Ākhirat	 me	 uska	 kuch	 hissa	 nahi	 aur	
beshak	kya	buri	cheez	hai	woh	jiske	badle	
unhoñ	ne	apni	jāneiñ	baychiñ	kisi	tarah	unheiñ	ilm	hota

arabicText: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّقَوْا۟ لَمَثُوبَةٌۭ مِّنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ خَيْرٌۭ ۖ لَّوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 had	 they	 believed	 and	 been	 pious,	
then	 the	 recompense	 from	 Allah is	
extremely	good;	if	only	they	knew!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	woh	Iman	lāte	aur	parhez-gāri	karte	to	Allah	ke	yahāñ	ka	swaab	bahut	achcha	hai	kisi	
tarah	unheiñ	ilm	hota

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَقُولُوا۟ رَٰعِنَا وَقُولُوا۟ ٱنظُرْنَا وَٱسْمَعُوا۟ ۗ وَلِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
. O People	who	 Believe,	 do	 not	 say	(to	 the	
Prophet	 Muhammad- peace	 and	 blessings	
be	upon	him),	“Raena	(Be	considerate	towards	us)”	but	say,“Unzurna	(Look	mercifully	upon	us)",	
and	 listen	 attentively	 from	 the	 start;	 and	 for	 the	 disbelievers	 is	 a	 painful	 punishment.	 (To	
disrespect	the	Holy	Prophet	– peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him	– is	blasphemy.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo* Rā'ēna	na	kaho	aur	yuñ	arz	karo	ke	huzoor	ham	par	nazar	rakheiñ	aur	pahle	hi	
se	baghaur	suno	aur	kāfiro	ke	liye	dard	nāk	‘azāb	hai

arabicText: مَّا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَلَا ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ أَن يُنَزَّلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَخْتَصُّ بِرَحْمَتِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	disbelieve	- the	People	given	 the	Book(s)	or	 the	polytheists	- do	not	wish	 that	any	
good	 be	 sent	 down	 upon	 you	 from	 your	 Lord;	 and	Allah chooses	 whomever	 He wills	 by	 His	
Mercy;	and	Allah is	the	Most	Munificent.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	kāfir	haiñ	kitābi	ya	mushrik	woh	nahi	chāhte	ke	tum	par	koi	bhalāi	utre	tumhāre	Rab	ke	
pās	se	aur	Allah	apni	rahmat	se	khās	karta	hai	jise	chāhe	aur	Allah	bade	fazl	wala	hai.

arabicText: مَّا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَلَا ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ أَن يُنَزَّلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَخْتَصُّ بِرَحْمَتِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	disbelieve	- the	People	given	 the	Book(s)	or	 the	polytheists	- do	not	wish	 that	any	
good	 be	 sent	 down	 upon	 you	 from	 your	 Lord;	 and	Allah chooses	 whomever	 He wills	 by	 His	
Mercy;	and	Allah is	the	Most	Munificent.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	kāfir	haiñ	kitābi	ya	mushrik	woh	nahi	chāhte	ke	tum	par	koi	bhalāi	utre	tumhāre	Rab	ke	
pās	se	aur	Allah	apni	rahmat	se	khās	karta	hai	jise	chāhe	aur	Allah	bade	fazl	wala	hai.

arabicText: مَا نَنسَخْ مِنْ ءَايَةٍ أَوْ نُنسِهَا نَأْتِ بِخَيْرٍۢ مِّنْهَآ أَوْ مِثْلِهَآ ۗ أَلَمْ تَعْلَمْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌ
englishTranslationText:
When	We	abrogate	a	verse	or	cause	it	to	
be	 forgotten,	 We	 will	 bring	 one	 better	
than	it	or	one	similar;	do	you	not	know	
that	Allah is	Able	to	do	all	things?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jab	koi	Āayat	ham	mansookh	 farmāyeiñ	
ya	bhula	deiñ	 to	us	se	behtar	ya	us	jaisi	
le	 āyeiñ	 ge.	 kya	 tujhe	 khabar	 nahi	 ke	
Allah	sab	kuch	kar	sakta	hai	.

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَعْلَمْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِىٍّۢ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ
englishTranslationText:
Do	 you	 not	 know	 that	 for	Allah only	 is	
the	 kingship	 of	 the	 heavens	 and	 the	
earth?	 And	 except	 Allah, you	 have	
neither	a	protector	nor	any	supporter?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	tujhe	khabar	nahi	ke	Allah	hi		ke	liye	
hai	āsmanoñ	wa	zameen	ki	bādshahi	aur	
Allah	 ke	 siwa	 tumhāra	 na	 koi	 himayati	
na	madad-gār

arabicText: أَمْ تُرِيدُونَ أَن تَسْـَٔلُوا۟ رَسُولَكُمْ كَمَا سُئِلَ مُوسَىٰ مِن قَبْلُ ۗ وَمَن يَتَبَدَّلِ ٱلْكُفْرَ بِٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ فَقَدْ ضَلَّ سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
englishTranslationText:
Do	 you	 wish	 to	 ask	 your	 Noble	
Messenger	 a	 question	 similar	 to	 what	
Moosa	was	 asked	 before?	And	whoever	
chooses	 disbelief	 instead	 of	 faith	 has	
gone	astray	from	the	Right	Path
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	 yeh	 chāhte	 ho	 ke	 apne	 Rasool	 se	
waisa	suwāl	karo	jo	Mūsā	se	pahle	huwa	
tha	 aur	 jo	 Imān	 ke	 badle	 kufr	 le	 woh	
theek	rāsta	bahek	gaya

arabicText: وَدَّ كَثِيرٌۭ مِّنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَوْ يَرُدُّونَكُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ إِيمَـٰنِكُمْ كُفَّارًا حَسَدًۭا مِّنْ عِندِ أَنفُسِهِم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَٱعْفُوا۟ وَٱصْفَحُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِىَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَمْرِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Many	 among	 People	 given	 the	 Book(s)	
wished	to	turn	you	to	disbelief	after	you	
had	 accepted	 faith;	 out	 of	 hearts’	 envy,	
after	the	truth	has	become	very	clear	to	
them;	 so	 leave	 them	 and	 be	 tolerant,	
until	Allah brings	His	command;	indeed	
Allah is	Able	to	do	all	things
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bahut	kitābiyoñ	ne	chāha	kāsh	 tumheiñ	
Imān	 ke	 b’ad	 kufr	 ki	 taraf	 pher	 deiñ	
apne	 diloñ	 ki	 jalan	 se	 b’ad	 iske	 ke	 haq	
unpar	 khoob	 zahir	 ho	 chuka	 hai	 to	 tum	
chodo	 aur	 dar-guzar	 karo	 yahāñ	 tak ki	
Allah	apna	hukm	lāye	beshak	Allah	har	cheez	par	qādir	hai

arabicText: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍۢ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 keep	 the	 prayer	 established,	 and	
pay	the	charity;	and	whatever	good	you	
send	ahead	 for	yourselves,	you	will	 find	
it	with	Allah;	indeed	Allah is	seeing	your	
deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Namāz	qāim	rakho	aur	Zakāt	do	aur	apni	jānoñ	ke	liye	jo	bhalāi	āge	bhejo	ge	usey	Allah	ke	
yahāñ	pao	ge	beshak	Allah	tumhāre	kām	dekh	raha	hai

arabicText: وَقَالُوا۟ لَن يَدْخُلَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ إِلَّا مَن كَانَ هُودًا أَوْ نَصَـٰرَىٰ ۗ تِلْكَ أَمَانِيُّهُمْ ۗ قُلْ هَاتُوا۟ بُرْهَـٰنَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	 People	 given	 the	 Book(s)	 said,	 “None	 will	 enter	 Paradise	 unless	 he	 is	 a	 Jew	 or	 a	
Christian”;	 these	 are	 their	 own	 imaginations;	 say	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	 and	
blessings	be	upon	him),	“Bring	your	proof,	if	you	are	truthful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Ahle-Kitāb	bole	hargiz	Jannat	meiñ	na	jāye	ga	magar	woh	jo	Yahūdi	ya	Nasrāni	ho	yeh	unki	
khayāl	bandiyāñ	haiñ	tum	farmao	lao	apni	daleel	agar	sachche	ho

arabicText: بَلَىٰ مَنْ أَسْلَمَ وَجْهَهُۥ لِلَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحْسِنٌۭ فَلَهُۥٓ أَجْرُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦ وَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Yes,	why	not?	Whoever	submits	his	face	for	the	sake	of	Allah,	and	is	virtuous,	his	reward	is	with	
his	Lord;	and	there	shall	be	no	fear	upon	them	nor	shall	they	grieve.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Hān	 kiyuñ	 nahi	 jis	 ne	 apna	 muñh	 jhukāya	 Allah	 ke	 liye	 aur	 woh	 nek-o-kār	 hai	 to	 uska	 neg	
(Badla)	uske	Rab	ke	pās	hai	aur	unheiñ	na	kuch andesha	ho	aur	na	kuch	gham
